Faith.verse: Now faith is the assurance of things hoped for, the conviction of things not seen.
For we walk by faith, not by sight.

Love.verse: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.
And now these three remain: faith, hope, and love. But the greatest of these is love.

Understanding.verse: The beginning of wisdom is this: Get wisdom. Though it cost all you have, get understanding.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
